title: Report: TCL may ride on Google TV and Roku to surpass LG as the second-largest TV maker
content:
TCL has been one of the fastest-growing brands in the TV industry, largely thanks to the success of its Roku TVs and, to a lesser extent, its Android TV OS lineup. According to a new report, TCL is now set to surpass LG in TV production.

moreâ€¦

The post Report: TCL may ride on Google TV and Roku to surpass LG as the second-largest TV maker appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: According to a new report, TCL could overtake LG in the TV market this year with a larger order for panels, suggesting higher sales targets.
